definition: compartment (of train, ship etc)/private room at restaurant/rented room for karaoke/hotel room rented by the hour
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Even a simple pasta would work; buy dessert from the bakery in the grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 还可以从食品杂货店的面包房中买一些甜点。

sentences.english: I stopped to feast my eyes on the cakes because I'm on diet.
sentences.chinese: 我正在减肥，所以只能到那些面包房去饱饱眼福。

sentences.english: The Club owns various kinds of luxury Kara OK compartments anda multifunctional hall.
sentences.chinese: 娱乐部拥有各型豪华的卡拉ok包房和一间多功能厅。

sentences.english: Yes, and you can book a private room in the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 是的，你可以在餐馆里预订一间包房。

sentences.english: Let me see your compartment number and berth number .
sentences.chinese: 让我看看你的包房号码和卧铺号码。

sentences.english: An enticing smell came from the bakery .
sentences.chinese: 从面包房里飘出了诱人的香味。

sentences.english: Edible business card made for the Bombay Bakery in Pakistan. [link]
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦的孟买面包房专用，可食。

sentences.english: Beyond the bakery, at number 29, Italy all but evaporates.
sentences.chinese: 在面包房旁的29号，意大利似乎在这里消失了。

sentences.english: Would you like the hall berth or the compartment?
sentences.chinese: 先生，请问您喜欢大厅卡座还是包房？

sentences.english: It has tables downstairs and private rooms upstairs;
sentences.chinese: 楼下是大堂，楼上是包房。

sentences.english: There is a bakery in our  community.
sentences.chinese: 我们小区有一个面包房。

sentences.english: This family never booked the first-class compartment of the train.
sentences.chinese: 这个家庭从不预订一等的火车卧车包房。

sentences.english: Why did they stop buying from the bakery?
sentences.chinese: 为什么他们不再从面包房里买东西了？

sentences.english: You can book a private room in the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在餐馆预订一间包房。

sentences.english: While in private dinner, Nicholas Tse in good spirits, breath easy and talk straight.
sentences.chinese: 而在包房吃饭时，谢霆锋情绪不错，谈笑自如。

sentences.english: Kempinski Hotel bakery is a dessert you can dine room.
sentences.chinese: 凯宾斯基饭店面包房是一家可以堂食的甜点房。

definition: private room (in a restaurant, or for karaoke etc)/parlor/booth/compartment
box (in a theater or concert hall)/private room (in a restaurant or karaoke)
private room (in a restaurant, bath house, etc)
teahouse/tea-stall with seats/tea-garden or teahouse seat
